events.message: I was involved in a car accident yesterday where my vehicle was hit from the rear at a stoplight.
The claim has been categorised under Auto Accident based on the details of the collision and vehicle damage.
An agent has been assigned to your case to assist with further processing of the claim.
We acknowledge receipt of your auto accident claim and will proceed with necessary steps shortly.
Please provide photos of your vehicle damage, police report, and insurance information for verification.
All requested documents including photos and police report have been submitted as per the instructions.
The investigation into the auto accident claim has officially started to assess the extent of damages.
The investigation is complete. Assessment confirms the damage to your vehicle is consistent with the reported collision.
A settlement amount has been proposed based on repair estimates and coverage details of your policy.
Customer has responded positively to the proposed settlement and is agreeable to the compensation offer.
The claim has been officially approved following customer acceptance of the settlement proposal.
Payment for the approved claim has been processed and issued to the customer's account successfully.
The auto accident claim is now closed after successful payment issuance and case resolution.
All claim documents and case files have been archived for future reference and regulatory compliance.
